title: On Winds of Change â€“ 2014 ABNA Entry
description: Amazon Breakthrough Novel Award (ABNA) Entry - this eBook is a sample of the first 3,000-5,000 words; it is not the full book. The ABNA contest is operated on Amazon.com only. Visit this entry on Amazon.com to leave customer feedback. To vote for the Grand Prize winner starting July 8, visit www.amazon.com/ABNA. When Cade Drake returns to West Fork, it has been five long years since he has seen Amy Bennett. He comes home to find her father dead and Amy desperately trying to save her land and ranch from her greedy stepmother. Will Amy turn to him for help or will she shun him after the way he left her in the past?
author: Ruth Davidson
